# WAError.connectionFailed(_:)

**Case**

An error that occurs if the service is unable to connect.

## Declaration

```swift
case connectionFailed(WAError.ConnectionFailedDetails)
```

## Checking for connection

- **WAError.ConnectionFailedDetails**: The optional details describing the failed connection.

items.description: The optional details describing the failed connection.
items.name: WAError.ConnectionFailedDetails
